issue.title: open.spotify.com

labels.name: A: Bug
labels.description: The issue is caused by a program bug

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://open.spotify.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopen.spotify.com) ### Comment > Aun con la extensi√≥n los comerciales o anuncios de Spotify gratuito siguen sonando cada 30 minutos o menos. Username: `@Allan Nitro` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/k57e4zxljy84wok4gs8g0so80sw84ogbunqbjriyqo.png?nc=1)

### Issue URL (Ads) [https://open.spotify.com/playlist/4zMUA4JkmSvABk6I2OTXve](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopen.spotify.com%2Fplaylist%2F4zMUA4JkmSvABk6I2OTXve) ### Comment > Listen to a few songs and a Progressive ad plays (note: to replicate, you must listen through a full 2-4 songs).
